AI Description: r-pillar is an R package that provides tools for reshaping and transforming tabular data into tidy formats. It is part of the tidyverse ecosystem and facilitates data cleaning and preparation tasks.
Core Features: The core features of r-pillar include functions for creating and reshaping data frames, formatting columns, managing column types, and displaying data in a structured and organized manner.
General Tags: Data Manipulation, Data Cleaning, Data Preparation
